groupHeaders: Over the past week, please rate your ability to do the following activities when using your prosthesis.
instructions: Please instruct the patient to rate their ability to do the listed activities in the last week by selecting the most appropriate response (e.g., 0 = unable to perform, 1 = high difficulty, 2 = moderate difficulty, 3 = little difficulty, 4 = no problems).
overview: The Prosthetic Mobility Questionnaire (PMQ) is a 12-item self-report measure of mobility in people with lower limb amputation.
population: The intended population includes the following condition: Lower Limb Amputation.
references: 1. Franchignoni F, Monticone M, Giordano A, et al. Rasch validation of the Prosthetic Mobility Questionnaire: A new outcome measure for assessing mobility in people with lower limb amputation. J Rehabil Med. 2015;47(5):460-465. doi:10.2340/16501977-1954
score_calculation: Calculate the Total Score by converting the Raw Score (sum of all responses) to a "Meas100" score.
score_interpretation: The "Meas100" score presents the measure rescaled on a 0-100 interval where 0 = least mobile and 100 = most mobile.
